price: 10. « Seigneur, dit (Zacharie), donne-moi un Signe. » « Ton Signe, répondit (Allah), sera de ne pas parler aux gens durant trois nuits, bien que bien portant. »
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱجۡعَل لِّيٓ ءَايَةٗۖ قَالَ ءَايَتُكَ أَلَّا تُكَلِّمَ ٱلنَّاسَ ثَلَٰثَ لَيَالٖ سَوِيّٗا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi ij'ʿal lī āyatan qāla āyatuka allā tukallima al-nāsa thalātha layālin sawiyyan
